Niscaya ami tomaka prthiraita pratinidhi bana'icho, eteke tumi manuhara majata subicara karaa arau prabrttira anusarana nakaraiba, kiyano ene karaile i tomaka allahara pathara paraa bicyuta karaibaâ€™. Niscaya yisakale allahara pathara paraa bicyuta haya sihamtara babe ache kathina sasti, karana sihamte bicara dirasaka paharai gaiche
